Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Lock
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Ashland, Cermak, Halsted to Orange Line terminal due to, street blockage near Archer/Lock.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Kedzie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
